snippet.title: Princess' Edge - Dragonstone v0-11a HD Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't forget to change the youtube video setting to 720HD if you want to watch the high quality version!

Princess' Edge - Dragonstone is a beat'em up similar along the lines of Bareknuckle/Street of Rage, Golden Axe, Oboro Muramasa, and Guardian Heroes.

The game features:
- a good amount of special technique, more if you count the aerial version.
- combo system, you can even do aerial combos
- backstab system, get behind your opponent and strike them for more damage
- smooth animation and control
- gamepad and keyboard are both supported
- support several screen resolutions
- 5 stages

The game is finished, it will be on sale soon. For news and questions, please visit: erobotan.wordpress.com
